snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | 11 Facts Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order #Frostpunk 2 Digital Deluxe now and get 3 days early access and more: http://re.11bits.com/dx3

Frostpunk 2 launches on September 20th, with Advanced Access for Deluxe Edition owners starting on September 17th. To get you in the mood and help you understand what the sequel is all about—and how it's different from the first game—check out 11 facts about Frostpunk 2.

00:00 The City Expands
00:30 The Needs Grow
00:58 Problems Arise
01:25 Citizen's Paths Diverge
01:45 Negotiate and Pass Laws
02:11 Twitch Integration
02:25 Navigate the Idea Tree
02:43 Keep the Factions in Check
03:02 Explore the Frostland
03:22 Build Colonies
03:53 Play Epic Story Mode or Utopia Builder
04:34 Discover Mod Support
